sentences.english: Barrington has composed the music for a new production of ‘A Midsummer Night’s Dream’.
sentences.chinese: 巴林顿为新版的《仲夏夜之梦》谱了曲。

sentences.english: Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 水由氢和氧组成。

detailed_translations.english: to write a piece of music

sentences.english: There was no trace of anyone having entered the room since then.
sentences.chinese: 没有任何迹象表明在那以后有人进过这房间。

sentences.english: Petra’s lost all trace of her German accent.
sentences.chinese: 彼得拉已完全没有德国口音。

sentences.english: Officers were unable to find any trace of drugs.
sentences.chinese: 警察未能找到毒品的蛛丝马迹。

sentences.english: I saw the faintest trace of a smile cross Sandra’s face.
sentences.chinese: 我看到桑德拉的脸上闪过一丝微笑。

sentences.english: We finally traced him to an address in Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 我们终于追查到他在芝加哥的一个地址。

detailed_translations.english: a small sign that shows that someone or something was present or existed
to find or discover sb/sth by looking carefully for them/it

sentences.english: The area is very rich in minerals .
sentences.chinese: 该地区矿产非常丰富。

sentences.english: a country with few mineral resources
sentences.chinese: 矿产资源稀少的国家

sentences.english: mineral water
sentences.chinese: 矿泉水

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is formed naturally in the earth, such as coal, salt, stone, or gold. Minerals can be dug out of the ground and used
of or containing or derived from minerals

sentences.english: This drug speeds up your metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 这种药物会加快你的新陈代谢。

detailed_translations.english: the chemical processes by which food is changed into energy in your body

sentences.english: What have I done to deserve this?
sentences.chinese: 我做了什么事，要得到这样的报应？

sentences.english: I’m sorry for the kids. They deserve better (= deserve to be treated in a better way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我为这些孩子感到难过，他们应该过得更好。

sentences.english: Ledley deserves a place in the team.
sentences.chinese: 莱德利应该在队里占有一席之地。

sentences.english: Paula deserves a special mention for all the help she has given us.
sentences.chinese: 应该特别提一下葆拉，她给了我们许多帮助。

sentences.english: I would never hit anyone, even if they deserved it.
sentences.chinese: 我决不会打人，哪怕他欠揍。

sentences.english: What has he done to deserve this punishment ?
sentences.chinese: 他做了什么，竟会受到这样的惩罚？

sentences.english: People who are sent to prison for drunk-driving get what they deserve .
sentences.chinese: 那些醉酒驾车被送进监狱的人是罪有应得的。

detailed_translations.english: to have earned something by good or bad actions or behaviour

sentences.english: the cost of repairs and maintenance
sentences.chinese: 维修保养费

sentences.english: The theatres were closed on Saturday and Sunday for routine maintenance .
sentences.chinese: 戏院周六和周日关闭进行例行维护。

sentences.english: Engineers are carrying out essential maintenance work on the main line to Cambridge.
sentences.chinese: 机修工正在对通往剑桥的干线进行必要的养护。

sentences.english: an evening class in car maintenance
sentences.chinese: 汽车保养的夜校课程

detailed_translations.chinese: 维持； 保养； 抚养费
detailed_translations.english: the repairs, painting etc that are necessary to keep something in good condition

sentences.english: Other people’s houses always intrigued her.
sentences.chinese: 别人的房子总令她好奇。

detailed_translations.english: to make secret plans to harm someone or make them lose their position of power
if something intrigues you, it interests you a lot because it seems strange or mysterious

detailed_translations.chinese: 阴谋， 诡计， 密谋
detailed_translations.english: the making of secret plans to harm someone or make them lose their position of power, or a plan of this kind

sentences.english: Belladonna and red arsenic are deadly poisons .
sentences.chinese: 颠茄和雄黄都是致命的毒物。

sentences.english: a box of rat poison
sentences.chinese: 一盒鼠药

sentences.english: He killed several people by poisoning their tea.
sentences.chinese: 他在茶里下毒杀死了几个人。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that can cause death or serious illness if you eat it, drink it etc
to give someone poison, especially by adding it to their food or drink, in order to harm or kill them

sentences.english: Offered the position of chairman, Smith declined, preferring to keep his current job.
sentences.chinese: 对担任主席的邀约，史密斯拒绝了，他宁愿留在现在的职位上。

sentences.english: Mary declined a hot drink and went to her room.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽谢绝了热饮料，到自己的房间去了。

sentences.english: The minister declined to comment (= refused to speak to people who report the news ) about the progress of the peace talks.
sentences.chinese: 部长拒绝就和谈进程发表评论。

detailed_translations.english: to say no politely when someone invites you somewhere, offers you something, or wants you to do something

sentences.english: She stood on the beach, gazing at the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 她站在海滩上，凝视着大海。

sentences.english: I like to swim in the ocean when it’s warm enough.
sentences.chinese: 海水足够暖的时候，我喜欢在海里游泳。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洋， 海洋； 许多， 大量
detailed_translations.english: the great mass of salt water that covers most of the Earth’s surface

sentences.english: She has three daughters from a previous marriage.
sentences.chinese: 她前一次婚姻生了三个女儿。

sentences.english: The marriage took place at St Bartholomew’s Church.
sentences.chinese: 婚礼是在圣巴托罗缪教堂举行的。

detailed_translations.english: the relationship between two people who are married, or the state of being married

sentences.english: a sweeping curve of railroad track
sentences.chinese: 铁轨的大弧线

sentences.english: The car took the curve much too quickly.
sentences.chinese: 那辆汽车拐弯太快了。

sentences.english: The track curved round the side of the hill.
sentences.chinese: 小路弯弯曲曲，依山盘旋。

detailed_translations.english: a line that gradually bends like part of a circle
to bend or move in the shape of a curve, or to make something do this

sentences.english: There was a constant stream of visitors to the house.
sentences.chinese: 参观这幢房子的游客川流不息。

sentences.english: Amy lived in constant fear of being attacked.
sentences.chinese: 埃米一直生活在害怕遭到袭击的恐惧之中。

sentences.english: He kept in constant contact with his family while he was in Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他在澳大利亚时一直和家人保持着联系。

sentences.english: travelling at a constant speed
sentences.chinese: 以恒定速度行驶

detailed_translations.english: happening regularly or all the time

sentences.english: Relax your stomach muscles , then stretch again.
sentences.chinese: 放松腹部肌肉，然后再绷紧。

sentences.english: Regular exercise will help to strengthen your muscles .
sentences.chinese: 经常锻炼有助于强健肌肉。

sentences.english: It took muscle to work in an old-fashioned kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 在老式厨房里干活很费力。

detailed_translations.english: one of the pieces of flesh inside your body that you use in order to move, and that connect your bones together

sentences.english: Once we’ve had the disease, we’re immune for life.
sentences.chinese: 我们一旦得过这种病，就获得了终身免疫力。

detailed_translations.chinese: 免疫的， 有免疫力的， 不受影响的； 免除的， 豁免的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is immune to a particular disease cannot catch it

sentences.english: Do you think that the spider can web anything?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得这蜘蛛能用网捕住什么吗?

sentences.english: Why not hold spider of the week contests in your home throughout this season?
sentences.chinese: 在这整个蜘蛛出没的季节里，为什么不在你家里举行蜘蛛周竞赛？

sentences.english: Likewise, by these investigators’ logic, male arachnophobes should get a mild tickle down there whenever they spy a spider scurrying across their desk.
sentences.chinese: 同样的，按这些研究者的逻辑，男性蜘蛛恐惧者每次看到蜘蛛爬过桌子都应该下身瘙痒咯？

detailed_translations.english: a small creature with eight legs, which catches insects using a fine network of sticky threads

sentences.english: The house stands in extensive grounds.
sentences.chinese: 这栋房子占地面积很大。

sentences.english: Fire has caused extensive damage to the island’s forests.
sentences.chinese: 大火严重毁坏了岛上的森林。

sentences.english: the extensive use of pesticides
sentences.chinese: 杀虫剂的大量使用

sentences.english: The exhibition has received extensive coverage in the national press.
sentences.chinese: 这次展览会被全国媒体广泛报道。

detailed_translations.english: large in size, amount, or degree

sentences.english: Native American pottery
sentences.chinese: 美洲印第安人的陶器

detailed_translations.english: objects made out of baked clay

sentences.english: Class enrollment, where each student has all of the course schedule selections, each student having his own bucket in the CGTT.
sentences.chinese: 班级入学，每个学生都有所有的课程安排选择，每个学生都将自己的选择放在 CGTT 中。

sentences.english: The human brain needs to be without oxygen for only four minutes before permanent damage occurs.
sentences.chinese: 人脑缺氧只需4分钟就会造成永久性损伤。

detailed_translations.english: a gas that has no colour or smell, is present in air, and is necessary for most animals and plants to live. It is a chemical element: symbol O

sentences.english: Sharks were circling around our boat.
sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼在我们的小船周围游弋。

sentences.english: Beware the sharks when you are making up your mind how to invest.
sentences.chinese: 当你决定如何投资时要提防诈骗者。

detailed_translations.english: a large sea fish with several rows of very sharp teeth that is considered to be dangerous to humans

sentences.english: In this example, we will use the most straightforward method of all -- writing our object reference to a file that will be picked up by our client.
sentences.chinese: 在这个示例中，我们将使用所有方法中最直截了当的一种 — 将对象引用写入一个文件，该 文件将由客户机选取。

sentences.english: She was taken to hospital with serious head injuries.
sentences.chinese: 她头部受重伤被送到医院。

sentences.english: Beckham has missed several games through injury
sentences.chinese: 贝克汉姆因伤错过了几场比赛。

sentences.english: He’s a lawyer who specializes in personal injury claims.
sentences.chinese: 他是个专门从事人身伤害索赔的律师。

detailed_translations.english: a wound or damage to part of your body caused by an accident or attack

sentences.english: The company is moving its corporate headquarters (= main offices ) from New York to Houston.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司要把总部从纽约迁到休斯敦。

sentences.english: Vince is vice-president of corporate communications.
sentences.chinese: 文斯是负责企业宣传的副总裁。

sentences.english: Corporate America is not about to be converted to the environmentalist cause.
sentences.chinese: 美国企业界不打算投身环保事业。

sentences.english: changing the corporate culture (= the way that people in a corporation think and behave ) to accept family-friendly policies
sentences.chinese: 改变公司文化，采取更关怀家庭的政策

sentences.english: an advertising campaign intended to reinforce our corporate identity
sentences.chinese: 旨在加强我们公司形象的广告宣传活动

sentences.english: The yacht can be hired for corporate hospitality (= entertainment provided by companies for their customers ) .
sentences.chinese: 可以租下这艘游艇用于公司招待客户。

detailed_translations.chinese: 法人团体的， 公司的； 全体的， 共同的
detailed_translations.english: belonging to or relating to a corporation

sentences.english: a bomb attack
sentences.chinese: 炸弹袭击

sentences.english: a knife attack
sentences.chinese: 持刀攻击

sentences.english: an arson attack
sentences.chinese: 纵火袭击

sentences.english: victims of racial attacks
sentences.chinese: 种族袭击的受害者

detailed_translations.chinese: 攻击， 进攻； 突然发作
detailed_translations.english: an act of violence that is intended to hurt a person or damage a place

sentences.english: Do you have to reserve tickets in advance?
sentences.chinese: 你必须预先订票吗？

detailed_translations.english: to arrange for a place in a hotel, restaurant, plane etc to be kept for you to use at a particular time in the future

detailed_translations.chinese: 储备； 保留； 拘谨， 矜持； 替补队员， 后备部队； 自然保护区
detailed_translations.english: a supply of something kept to be used if it is needed

sentences.english: In those days the land was plowed by oxen.
sentences.chinese: 在那个年代是用公牛来犁地的。

sentences.english: a ploughed field
sentences.chinese: 犁过的地

detailed_translations.english: to turn over the earth using a plough so that seeds can be planted
a piece of farm equipment used to turn over the earth so that seeds can be planted

sentences.english: agricultural commodities
sentences.chinese: 农业商品

sentences.english: Commodity prices fell sharply.
sentences.chinese: 商品价格急剧下跌。

detailed_translations.english: a product that is bought and sold

sentences.english: The city needs to improve its public transportation (= buses, trains etc ) .
sentences.chinese: 这座城市需要改善公共交通。

detailed_translations.english: a system or method for carrying passengers or goods from one place to another

sentences.english: operational activities/costs/difficulties
sentences.chinese: 营运上的活动 / 成本 / 困难

sentences.english: The boat should be operational by this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午这艘船应该可以使用了。

sentences.english: The new system became operational in March.
sentences.chinese: 新的系统于3月份启用。

sentences.english: Our main offices are now fully operational.
sentences.chinese: 我们的总部现已全面投入运营。

detailed_translations.english: relating to the operation of a business, government etc

sentences.english: an aerial attack
sentences.chinese: 空袭

sentences.english: aerial photographs
sentences.chinese: 在空中拍摄的照片

sentences.english: an aerial view of the Three Gorges Dam project
sentences.chinese: 一张三峡大坝工程鸟瞰图

detailed_translations.chinese: 飞机的，航空的；空中的，架空的
detailed_translations.english: from a plane
a piece of equipment for receiving or sending radio or television signals, usually consisting of a piece of metal or wire

sentences.english: He advocated the removal of trade barriers.
sentences.chinese: 他提倡消除贸易壁垒。

sentences.english: Crowds burst through the barriers and ran onto the pitch.
sentences.chinese: 人群冲破围栏跑进球场。

sentences.english: The mountains form a natural barrier between the two countries.
sentences.chinese: 群山构成了两国之间的天然屏障。

detailed_translations.english: a rule, problem etc that prevents people from doing something, or limits what they can do

sentences.english: ...farming without any purchased chemical, fertilizer or pesticide.
sentences.chinese: …不使用任何购买的化学品、肥料或杀虫剂的耕作。

detailed_translations.english: a substance that is put on the soil to make plants grow

sentences.english: Our research has only recently begun to yield important results.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近我们的研究才开始取得重要成果。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a result, answer, or piece of information

sentences.english: Fish and shellfish are the specialties.
sentences.chinese: 鱼和甲壳类水生动物是特产。

detailed_translations.chinese: 甲壳类动物；贝类等有壳的水生动物
detailed_translations.english: an animal that lives in water, has a shell, and can be eaten as food, for example  crab s  ,  lobster s  , and  oyster s

sentences.english: nomadic herdsmen
sentences.chinese: 游牧民

detailed_translations.english: nomadic people are nomads

sentences.english: There were crumbs and grains of sugar on the table.
sentences.chinese: 桌子上有面包屑和糖粒。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谷物， 谷粒， 颗粒； 少量， 微量
detailed_translations.english: a single very small piece of a substance such as sand or salt

sentences.english: She was pedalling furiously (= very fast ) .
sentences.chinese: 她飞快地踩着踏板。

detailed_translations.english: to ride a bicycle
one of the two parts of a bicycle that you push round with your feet to make the bicycle go forward
of or relating to the foot or feet

sentences.english: I was so hungry my stomach hurt.
sentences.chinese: 我饿得胃都痛了。

sentences.english: His stomach was full of food.
sentences.chinese: 他的胃里塞满了食物。

detailed_translations.english: the organ inside your body where food begins to be  digested
to be able to accept something, especially something unpleasant

sentences.english: American children did less well in math than their peers in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 美国儿童的数学成绩不如日本的同龄儿童。

sentences.english: Staff members are trained by their peers.
sentences.chinese: 员工由同事培训。

detailed_translations.english: your peers are the people who are the same age as you, or who have the same type of job, social class etc

sentences.english: a scene of indescribable confusion
sentences.chinese: 难以形容的混乱场面

sentences.english: To avoid confusion, the teams wore different colours.
sentences.chinese: 为了避免混淆，各队穿着不同颜色的服装。

detailed_translations.english: a very confusing situation, that usually has a lot of noise and action, so that it is difficult for someone to understand it or control it

sentences.english: a big bass drum
sentences.chinese: 一面低音大鼓

sentences.english: 1,000 people marched, beating drums and carrying flags.
sentences.chinese: 1,000人打着鼓扛着旗游行。

sentences.english: Jones played the drums in an all-girl band.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯在一个女子乐队里打鼓。

sentences.english: a brake drum
sentences.chinese: 制动鼓

sentences.english: a 5 gallon oil drum
sentences.chinese: 5加仑的油桶

detailed_translations.english: a musical instrument made of skin stretched over a circular frame, played by hitting it with your hand or a stick

sentences.english: The intensity of the hurricane was frightening.
sentences.chinese: 飓风的猛烈程度令人恐惧。

detailed_translations.chinese: 强烈，剧烈；〔光、声等的〕强度
detailed_translations.english: the quality of being felt very strongly or having a strong effect

sentences.english: the fading evening light
sentences.chinese: 渐暗的暮色

sentences.english: a pair of faded jeans
sentences.chinese: 一条褪了色的牛仔裤

sentences.english: The sun had faded the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 太阳把窗帘晒得褪了色。

detailed_translations.english: to lose colour and brightness, or to make something do this

sentences.english: Computer game pirates cost the industry twenty million pounds a year.
sentences.chinese: 电脑游戏盗版者每年要给该行业带来两千万英镑的损失。

detailed_translations.chinese: 海盗；盗版；侵犯专利权者
detailed_translations.english: someone who sails on the seas, attacking other boats and stealing things from them
to illegally copy and sell another person’s work such as a book, video, or computer program
